common.supportText: If you have any questions, contact our support at {supportEmail}
common.doNotReply: This is an automated email, please do not reply.

verification.subject: Verify your email address
verification.title: Email Verification
verification.body: Thank you for signing up on our Festival platform. To activate your account, please click the button below.
verification.expiry: This link will expire in {hours} hours.
verification.ignoreIfNotYou: If you did not create an account, you can ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Reset your password
passwordReset.title: Password Reset
passwordReset.body: You have requested to reset your password. Click the button below to choose a new password.
passwordReset.expiry: This link will expire in {hours} hours.
passwordReset.ignoreIfNotYou: If you did not request this reset, you can ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

welcome.subject: Welcome to Festival!
welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.body: Your account has been successfully activated. You can now enjoy all the features of our platform.

ticketPurchase.subject: Your ticket purchase confirmation
ticketPurchase.title: Your purchase is confirmed!
ticketPurchase.body: Thank you for your purchase. Here is a summary of your order:
ticketPurchase.qrCodeInfo: Present the QR code of your tickets at the festival entrance.

ticketTransfer.subject: You have received a ticket!
ticketTransfer.title: A ticket has been transferred to you
ticketTransfer.body: {senderName} has transferred a ticket to you for {festivalName}.

cashlessTopup.subject: Cashless top-up confirmation
cashlessTopup.title: Top-up completed
cashlessTopup.body: Your cashless account has been successfully topped up.

refund.subject: Refund confirmation
refund.title: Refund processed
refund.body: Your refund request has been successfully processed.
refund.delay: The refund will appear on your account within 5 to 10 business days.

eventReminder.subject: Reminder: {festivalName} starts soon!
eventReminder.title: Don't miss the event!
eventReminder.body: The festival {festivalName} starts in {days} day(s). Get ready for an unforgettable experience!

tips.title: Helpful tips:
tips.cashless: Remember to top up your cashless account
tips.weather: Check the weather and prepare accordingly
